cv.cv_object: 37 year old male, credibility and independence, positive attitude and determined at all times, previous foreign experience

cv.work_job_descr_9: • Company´s solutions sale • Information collecting (about possible partners, clients, producers and so on) • Leads generation • Appointments and meetings with clients • Contacting clients by phone or e-mail, social network and so on. • Offers preparation. Company representation to potential clients, presentations and demo-stands. • Contracts making, managing and so on. • Client´s requests management. • CRM analysze. • Marketing and new solutions representation. • Taking part in meetings, seminars and conferences. • Sales plan creation and representation. • Client`s database creation. • Taking part in sales department projects. • Client`s motivation to make the cooperation with company.
cv.work_job_descr_10: - Following up new business opportunities and setting up meetings - Planning and preparing presentations - Communicating new products developments to prospective clients - Overseeing the development of marketing literature - Writing reports - Providing management with feedback
cv.work_job_descr_11: • Company´s product sale • Information collecting (about possible partners, clients, producers and so on) • Leads generation • Appointments and meetings with clients • Contacting clients by phone or e-mail, social network and so on. • Offers preparation. Company representation to potential clients, presentations and demo-stands. • Contracts making, managing and so on. • Client´s requests management. • CRM analysze. • Marketing and new solutions representation. • Taking part in meetings, seminars and conferences. • Taking part in funds searching through pitching. • Sales plan creation and representation. • Client`s database creation. • Taking part in sales department projects. • Client`s motivation to make the cooperation with company.
cv.work_job_descr_12: - Establishes, develops and maintains business relationships with prospective customers in the assigned market area to generate new business for the organization’s products/services. - Makes telephone calls and in-person visits and presentations to prospective customers. - Researches sources for developing prospective customers and for information to determine their potential. - Develops clear and effective written proposals/quotations for prospective customers. - Expedites the resolution of customer problems and complaints. - Coordinates sales effort with marketing, sales management, accounting, logistics and technical service groups. - Analyzes the market’s potential and determines the customers value to the organization. Identifies advantages and compares products/services produced by Top Connect with competitive solutions available in the assigned area. - Plans and organizes personal sales strategy by maximizing the Return on Time Investment for the area. - Supplies management with oral and written reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services. - Keeps abreast of product applications, technical services, market conditions, competitive activities, advertising and promotional trends through the reading of pertinent literature and consulting with marketing and technical service areas. - Participates in trade shows and conventions.
cv.work_job_descr_13: Responsibilities Key Responsibilities: As OEM Partner Account Manager you will lead, plan implement and execute the sales strategy for assigned Retail and System Builder accounts. Your overall objective is to maximize revenues, increase the in-house share and create a broad distribution with high visibility of the Microsoft products. You will drive strategy, planning and execution of OEM accounts in conjunction with the overall priorities and goals set by Sales Management. The OEM Account Manager needs to develop the partner relationship on various levels and in many distinct ways, but always under the promise to ensure the best experience a partner can have when dealing with Microsoft. The condition of satisfaction should become a key driver for deep commitment to Microsoft’s product portfolio as a key element in the partners own business strategy. Based on excellent partnerships and optimized execution we expect you to increase revenues, market shares, profit and to delight our partners and become their trusted advisor for building a joint business in the OEM and retail space in Estonia.
cv.work_comp_name_14: Top Connect Ltd. subsidiary company CSC Telecom Estonia Ltd.
cv.work_job_descr_14: - Establishes, develops and maintains business relationships with prospective customers in the assigned market area to generate new business for the organization’s products/services. - Makes telephone calls and in-person visits and presentations to prospective customers. - Researches sources for developing prospective customers and for information to determine their potential. - Develops clear and effective written proposals/quotations for prospective customers. - Expedites the resolution of customer problems and complaints. - Coordinates sales effort with marketing, sales management, accounting, logistics and technical service groups. - Analyzes the market’s potential and determines the customers value to the organization. Identifies advantages and compares products/services produced by Top Connect with competitive solutions available in the assigned area. - Plans and organizes personal sales strategy by maximizing the Return on Time Investment for the area. - Supplies management with oral and written reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services. - Keeps abreast of product applications, technical services, market conditions, competitive activities, advertising and promotional trends through the reading of pertinent literature and consulting with marketing and technical service areas. - Participates in trade shows and conventions.

application.mot_letter: Greetings, I’d appreciate the opportunity to discuss the position and my candidacy with you. You can find my resume uploaded herewith. I am looking to bring my well-honed public relations, sales, marketing client focused, oral and interpersonal communication skills internally to succeed in the role I am given. My experience includes nearly two decades in sales, marketing and business development (Security System, Digital and Audio Visual) in the external and internal client facing environments nationally and internationally at senior levels. I began my career as a sales executive where I bought new clients to the company. I developed my career to Audio Visual Team Leader and then to Sales Manager for Gulf Commercial Group, Dubai, United Arab Emirates. I have succeeded in managing a team of 32 members and sub-contractors to optimize audio-visual products’ installation for multimillion clients. I have successfully completed training in Tandberg, Polycom and Lifesize video conferencing systems. I have trained twenty-eight senior staffs of Emirates National Bank of Dubai( Emirates NBD) on teamboard ( Interactive whiteboard). I have obtained technical and sales training from net display systems( Digital Signage Solutions) and Qmatic (Queue management systems). At A-Square Audio Visual, I handled the entire division which includes sales and marketing, technical, digital, finance, and logistics. I was constantly in touch with the corporate clients and government sectors to give new ideas to implement updated products over the existing ones. I have over 12 years’ experience in Audio-visual products and services. I am an Indian citizen and I have applied for my temporary residence permit to Estonia to join my wife who is doing her Master’s at Tallinn University. I am available to join immediately. I’d love to find out more about the position you are looking to fill, and I would welcome the opportunity to tell you how my skills and ideas can benefit your organization. I can be reached at (+91) 808-606-9999 or a.ancel.a@gmail.com. Thanks for your consideration; I look forward to hearing from you soon. Sincerely, Ancel Cleetus Fernandez LinkedIn: Ancel Cleetus

Hello, I would like to apply for the Sales Manager job vacancy. I have a bachelors degree in Programming and a basic knowledge of IT field. However, I have never worked as a programmer as I find myself more comfortable working with people in such positions like sales, marketing and event organizing. I can describe myself as energetic and optimistic person with excellent communication and organizational skills. I am a fast learner and able to adjust myself to new working environment. I have experience of working in international companies and working abroad. Currently I am living in Muscat, Oman, but planning to return to Tallinn soon. I will be able to come for an interview from mid. of April. If you have any question please get in touch with me by email or phone number: +96893590805 Thank you and hope to hear from you soon. With best regards, Aljona Gvozdik
